archimate:Requirement.name: 4.54.2 Collaboration platform information management control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The security of collaboration platforms should be improved by: only permitting the acquisition and use of approved platforms assessing the information risks of each platform being acquired or in use adding, updating and deleting user profiles (e.g. following recruitment of new staff or changes to their job role) making users aware of how to use these platforms securely (e.g. through an acceptable use policy for employees or a code of conduct for external users).
